title: The original chart instance in report design handle is not modified after running the report.
description: The original bug report lacks details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.
OB: The chart in the report design handle remains unchanged after running the report.
EB: The chart in the report design handle should reflect modifications made during report execution.
SR:
1. Open the report design handle with a chart instance.
2. Make modifications to the chart.
3. Run the report.
4. Observe that the chart in the report design handle does not reflect the changes made in step 2.
